title: The 2020 fight for Florida: Marc Caputo, Beth Reinhard & filmmaker Billy Corben
description: In the final installment of Florida Florida Florida, the Chuck ToddCast returns with a 2020 Florida-centric panel. Politico correspondent Marc Caputo and Washington Post reporter Beth Reinhard talk about their years covering politics in the sunshine state. Documentary filmmaker Billy Corben talks to Chuck about his new film, "537 Votes."
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
